response_text: <rss xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" version="2.0"><channel><atom:link href="http://feed.cnet.com/feed/collection" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" /><title>CNET Android Update</title><description>News, analysis and tips on the Google Android operating system, and devices and apps that use it.</description><image><url>http://i.i.cbsi.com/cnwk.1d/i/ne/gr/prtnr/CNET_Logo_150.gif</url><title>CNET Android Update</title><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CADe34d7bf ]]></link></image><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CADe34d7bf ]]></link><item><title>Android trounces Apple across the globe - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/android-trounces-apple-across-the-world/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">267d54df-c669-4d05-baeb-7f89f7c1da3d</guid><pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 14:01:46 +0000</pubDate><description>Android makers sell a huge variety of phones at different prices and thus can reach a wider audience than Apple can with the iPhone, says research firm Kantar Worldpanel ComTech.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/10/31/ead58202-5b06-4a6b-958c-44dbc286d953/thumbnail/300x230/a13ea5e0034b83785e5f415f76935812/android130million1.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Viking Horde malware attacks Android devices - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/viking-horde-malware-attacks-android-devices/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">061d6d98-7fba-4ea2-8573-52ab002af6c5</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 20:15:52 +0000</pubDate><description>A new strain of malware is targeting Android devices via infected apps at the Google Play app store, says security firm Check Point.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/0371522c-4505-4b78-9057-13ac94767e4d/thumbnail/300x230/d9d7030fd8d1133a7539cb4d6ff908b3/viking-horde.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Marshmallow spreads to 7.5% of all Android devices - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/marshmallow-spreads-to-7-5-percent-of-all-android-devices/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">8da8a671-20d3-4542-a70f-77674f8c9eb1</guid><pubDate>Wed, 04 May 2016 14:00:05 +0000</pubDate><description>But Lollipop remains the most favored flavor. It's on nearly five times as many gadgets as the newer Marshmallow.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/08/21/b31e9754-f690-4c87-818c-fc5e2997b231/thumbnail/300x230/cd6491b1c91fa5d6bd560c77df5d02bb/google-android-marshmallow-5.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>5 settings every new Android owner should change - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/5-settings-every-new-android-owner-should-change/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">a476f621-4f27-45c4-b89d-bd98fdf515f7</guid><pubDate>Thu, 05 May 2016 04:07:27 +0000</pubDate><description>Whether you're a newcomer to Android or just upgrading to a newer model, consider tweaking these settings to improve performance and battery life.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/10/24/a5321859-3d57-4bec-a512-b24b23c11268/thumbnail/300x230/7623965c00161ae6b03dbc238b0b95bb/google-nexus-5x-2549-004.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Google Play Music adds podcasts to the mix - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/google-play-music-now-does-podcasts-too/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">089b408c-e4bd-4e4f-988e-cf6b0ec01823</guid><pubDate>Tue, 19 Apr 2016 12:12:22 +0000</pubDate><description>The streaming service will offer up podcasts based on what users are doing or interested in, similar to its contextual playlists for music.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/18/d9615c5b-1c9b-4686-8704-985e769bc815/thumbnail/300x230/c2a49ac221deacca9836803666008089/android.jpg"/><dc:creator>Dong Ngo</dc:creator></item><item><title>Android Pay dangles 2GB of free data for Verizon subscribers - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/android-pay-dangles-2gb-free-data-for-verizon-subscribers/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">92ff1dbf-b6f4-4f38-a60a-1444175fd650</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Apr 2016 14:53:28 +0000</pubDate><description>Tap to buy an item, and you could scarf up some extra storage.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/15/1e3080d4-3e38-44e6-9673-f269a9fd27d7/thumbnail/300x230/450d6f7e3dd015a14351417cf4bce499/verizon-android-pay.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Use Facebook Messenger to send and receive money - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/use-facebook-messenger-to-send-and-receive-money/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">ec416b9a-05c0-46bb-942f-79cd6eb77b10</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Apr 2016 21:52:48 +0000</pubDate><description>It's a little-known fact that Facebook's chat app can also make like PayPal. Here's how to set it up.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/11/10/7cea0f1d-d18f-41c4-9cd7-4347c949624f/thumbnail/300x230/344bf53240a94bbf0e385be2673ecff0/messenger.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Android Marshmallow uptake doubles since last month - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/android-marshmallow-uptake-doubles-since-last-month/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">6574eb50-98ec-469e-a1e6-3862fab19696</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2016 16:42:16 +0000</pubDate><description>The latest flavor of Google's mobile software is finally squeezing its way into more devices.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/08/17/b8632e18-643c-4e24-84ba-8143a09b3eb1/thumbnail/300x230/97eb552bd1003784da40ee5f16ca7bab/image00.png"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>How to choose the right microSD card for your Android - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/microsd-cards-for-android-how-to-choose-capacity-speed/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">f64834ab-5adf-4041-9749-e6c0bd359eef</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Apr 2016 20:53:46 +0000</pubDate><description>Want to add extra storage to your device, but not sure what you should be looking for in a microSD card? Here's what you need to know.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/03/01/c31f7957-0961-43b7-9be6-774667caa36b/thumbnail/300x230/f648645cd6a9b33fa47fceb0d8fb7a65/gadgets-wearables-pepcom-mwc-2015-16.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>How to encrypt your iOS or Android device - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-encrypt-your-ios-or-android-device/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">e86a9db6-60f6-44be-b767-6200e2b556be</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Apr 2016 03:52:12 +0000</pubDate><description>Keep your personal data protected in a few easy steps.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/24/ef1abe9b-8d62-4b1d-b6f6-cbf7d91cd84e/thumbnail/300x230/2bdaaaf65fd8d5340b08a4a5189eb81d/iphone-se-21.jpg"/><dc:creator>Dan Graziano</dc:creator></item><item><title>5 Android shortcuts you'll wish you knew all along - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/best-android-shortcuts/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">0edbd7cb-4db8-4742-a431-6928889ce280</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 18:11:17 +0000</pubDate><description>​While Android doesn't have keyboard shortcuts, these time-saving tips are the next best thing.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/12/23/9cfbd2cd-f30f-4151-99ba-7efd00a6e17b/thumbnail/300x230/509edcf4b9d78fd5e8fb9f97e3ebe31f/river-android-phones-8278.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Lego Jurassic World comes to Android, iOS - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/lego-jurassic-world-comes-to-android-ios/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">457c0044-a1cd-4d3c-82e9-b08fe821f1ce</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 17:36:48 +0000</pubDate><description>Way, way better than sitting through the movie. Cheaper, too.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/31/482ee698-693e-4dee-9e74-efb7be9e5ac9/thumbnail/300x230/fc46fd8cb1f99ec9b3c2ebf9f51217f9/jurassic-world-ios.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>The complete guide to Android Pay - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-use-android-pay/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">3b62b868-0058-42eb-ab64-d840631ea125</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 11:51:37 +0000</pubDate><description>Want to learn more about Google's mobile payment system? This FAQ will help answer your questions and more.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/06/19/6d958179-ffa1-4f6d-92f7-d706d31b05bb/thumbnail/300x230/0947d2e52b2be67d91125e895c54c3c3/paycollage.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Eyes-on with Hulu for Gear VR - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/eyes-on-with-hulu-for-gear-vr/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">1c4a9427-20e2-4c26-ac6e-315f6cdf79b6</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Mar 2016 17:45:44 +0000</pubDate><description>The streaming service now offers a "big-screen" viewer for Samsung Gear VR owners. Here's what I thought of the experience.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/29/ac0d2494-bd8b-4e1f-a5b8-4dfef235e08c/thumbnail/300x230/c7146e7c53b6d137a80b1a10e728f1ab/hulu-app-in-oculus-store.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Facebook finally lets Android users upload high-resolution photos - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/enable-hd-photo-uploads-from-facebook-for-android/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">8feda2fe-5431-43f9-b371-79860d8fb987</guid><pubDate>Tue, 22 Mar 2016 20:56:36 +0000</pubDate><description>Want your photos on Facebook to look their best? There's a new option you need to enable right now.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/01/28/918e5263-a419-4bd3-bbb6-7a699d795a68/thumbnail/300x230/63e908e2ddd965ea0296bae53673d87c/facebook-lite.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Hands-on with VR Cups virtual-reality lenses - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/hands-on-with-vr-cups-virtual-reality-lenses/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">0ca05661-8089-4dec-9ddb-2d88c60cfc72</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2016 15:18:57 +0000</pubDate><description>Need a quick VR fix? These portable lenses suction right to your smartphone -- which, it turns out, is a terrible idea.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/21/00032d83-df93-4b74-a86f-0b451f2d9b4e/thumbnail/300x230/0d9ff55172922acbb220ff84eeacfeb3/vr-cups-stacked.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Hands-on with the Siam 7x dual-screen smartphone - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/hands-on-with-the-siam-7x-dual-screen-smartphone/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">c482dd1e-4829-4444-b15f-a0e71a0a68eb</guid><pubDate>Wed, 16 Mar 2016 21:48:27 +0000</pubDate><description>It's a 5-inch Android phone on one side and 4.7-inch e-ink reader on the other. But does the Franken-phone concept really work?</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/16/adef5504-26c3-45dc-a68b-92fb88aaf87f/thumbnail/300x230/6ab69c107f12ba9b94c18f47b70ebea4/siam-7x-2.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Yellow Nexus 5X screen? Here's the fix - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-fix-a-yellow-nexus-5x-screen/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">32b23175-c468-490f-813b-059f3d8d2500</guid><pubDate>Tue, 15 Mar 2016 19:10:47 +0000</pubDate><description>A recent update for the Nexus 5x adds a toggle to adjust the color temperature of the screen.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/09/30/8db8241a-2b1d-465d-9389-f14ef35a275d/thumbnail/300x230/5a919bb7e560d79a307cd8e7c692016a/fd-google-092915-nexus-5x-nexus5x-5886.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Krew Mobile unveils affordable phone plan for families - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/krew-mobile-unveils-affordable-phone-plan-for-families/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">81ccc3f6-d1f0-492a-8522-5809efba575a</guid><pubDate>Sat, 12 Mar 2016 13:41:46 +0000</pubDate><description>One line for you, two lines for the kids, $40 per month. There's a catch, but maybe it's not a bad one?</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/11/a94fccbc-0004-4bcb-9333-f444cb36d6fd/thumbnail/300x230/428b6902619bc3a7e246cc0b2966ae57/krew-mobile.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Samsung Galaxy S7 gets promo love from Verizon - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/verizon-pushes-samsung-galaxy-s7-and-s7-edge-with-deals-promos/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">c597339a-13d6-4357-bb0e-005b8434a503</guid><pubDate>Fri, 11 Mar 2016 18:39:26 +0000</pubDate><description>Verizon is the latest carrier to offer special deals on Samsung's new Galaxy phones.  Buy an S7 and get a Core Prime phone for $1 a month.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/03/25/6dac731b-573f-4217-ad2c-ae1b52dc0dac/thumbnail/300x230/501beece58ef667cae464e58de807a4a/samsung-galaxy-s6-9227.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Speed up your Android by adjusting animation settings - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/speed-up-your-android-by-adjusting-animation-settings/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">8b3db3a4-d9cf-4017-804e-30fa9b9bd878</guid><pubDate>Fri, 11 Mar 2016 04:56:10 +0000</pubDate><description>Using an older Android device, or just want to make an easy speed adjustment? Check out these quick steps to get moving.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/05/30/7edeadce-d5b0-4ddb-a453-742c29ec0b72/thumbnail/300x230/d6c9df437786029f1f42e4328304be4d/android-stopwatch.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Lollipop is now the hottest flavor of Android - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/android-lollipop-overtakes-kitkat-as-marshmallow-languishes/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">421df8ce-7ed8-40f9-a240-9991fe81ee41</guid><pubDate>Wed, 09 Mar 2016 16:19:08 +0000</pubDate><description>Meanwhile, the newest version, Marshmallow, remains a scarce commodity on the phones you and your friends are using.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/10/15/eb2fc4a4-7e08-4b64-971c-dbe245859ef7/thumbnail/300x230/2547774b6f0a69f8a14f431a3d407680/lollipop-forest.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>How to play Android games on your Windows PC - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-play-android-games-on-your-windows-pc/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">f88f4b9d-3149-4d8a-8a67-2bff54c04a28</guid><pubDate>Fri, 04 Mar 2016 17:26:05 +0000</pubDate><description>Free Android emulator Nox App Player specializes in desktop-powered gaming. Here's how to get started.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/04/3c48a62a-faf0-426e-8f3b-3b179034c85c/thumbnail/300x230/cd127837f2c2f01e46df2d7d409f894e/nox-emulator-hero.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Here's what's new in Google Photos v1.15 - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/heres-whats-new-in-google-photos-v1-5/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">91dc9703-f105-4ccf-83e2-c61ad09ccbae</guid><pubDate>Fri, 04 Mar 2016 21:19:29 +0000</pubDate><description>Features of the Google Photos app have been redesigned and moved around a bit in the latest version. Read on to find out what's new.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/06/03/397a989b-05c2-4a47-99cc-a6feb9127960/thumbnail/300x230/0e00a27bf0ac12056bfb2321dd71bfd6/river-google-photos.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nicole Cozma</dc:creator></item><item><title>Augmented-reality t-shirt reveals your insides - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/augmented-reality-t-shirt-reveals-your-insides/#ftag=CADe34d7bf</link><guid isPermaLink="false">7fcff9e1-5442-457b-9014-d64a20101cac</guid><pubDate>Wed, 02 Mar 2016 20:41:31 +0000</pubDate><description>Point your phone at someone wearing the Virtuali-Tee and you'll see their rib cage, beating heart and more. In your face, X-ray vision!</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/02/64894bb8-6432-44f8-ba29-a7450dcbc31e/thumbnail/300x230/21eb326c44933f9787192a857ebb294e/b48c92e4e7ae5e0b6a28c12b7477509coriginal.gif"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item></channel></rss>
